documentation.text:
@title IvAMM
 @dev Interface for the virtual Automated Market Maker
@dev Closes a position partially or fully
@dev Gets position data for a user
@dev Calculates unrealized PnL for a position
@dev Gets the price impact for a trade

devdoc.details: Interface for the virtual Automated Market Maker

closePosition(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Closes a position partially or fully

getPosition(address).details: Gets position data for a user

getPriceImpact(uint256,bool).details: Gets the price impact for a trade

getUnrealizedPnL(address).details: Calculates unrealized PnL for a position
